scripts.frontend:dev: cd frontend && REACT_APP_API_PORT=3001 REACT_APP_FRONTEND_PORT=3003 npm start
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cd backend && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install:all && npm run frontend:build
